model.name: templateBeanFactory
model.title: Template Bean Factory
model.description: A route template bean factory (local bean)
model.label: configuration

language.description: The language to use for creating the bean (such as groovy, joor)

script.description: The script to execute that creates the bean. If the script use the prefix resource: such as resource:classpath:com/foo/myscript.groovy, resource:file:/var/myscript.groovy, then its loaded from the external resource.
